item.description:
I wanted to try going to Den Rock again--got rained out last time!
Check out this link for more info

http://www.rockclimbi...
This is a good cliff to take a lesson on so if you need to learn to belay/tie in/ skills please let me know. Also if you need gear please let me by Friday.

THIS MEETUP LOOKS AS IF IT WILL BE RAINED OUT!!! AGAIN! PLEASE CALLL MY CELL TO CHECK FOR SURE! IF IT IS RAINING I WILL OPEN THE GYM AT THE FOSTER CLIMBING BARN FROM 10AM-1PM ON SAT INSTEAD! A $5 climbing fee and waiver will need to be signed. CHECK YOUR PLANS AND SEE IF YOU CAN COME TO THAT INSTEAD CHANGE YOUR RSVP TO REFLECT THE CHANGE
Thanks,
Kellie
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the meetup sign or follow the path and to the left is the cliff
item.name: Try it again Den Rock
